story.title: Amateka Yacu
story.content1: DECIFO TOURISM yatangijwe n'intego yoroshye: gusangiza isi ubwiza budasanzwe n'umuco w'u Rwanda. Izina ryacu, risobanura ngo "Ngwino Urebe u Rwanda Rwiza," rigaragaza ubwitange bwacu mu gutanga ibikorwa by'ukuri kandi byimbitse.
story.content2: Ikipe yacu igizwe n'abayobozi b'ingendo b'abanyarwanda bafite ubumenyi bwimbitse ku mateka y'u Rwanda, inyamaswa, n'imigenzo. Twizera ko ubukerarugendo bugomba kugirira akamaro abaturage bo mu gace kandi bukagira uruhare mu kubungabunga ibidukikije, niyo mpamvu dukorana bya hafi n'abafatanyabikorwa bo mu gace kandi dushyigikira ibikorwa birambye.
story.content3: Waba ushaka gusura ingagi, kureba imisozi itatse ubwiza, cyangwa kwiga umuco w'u Rwanda, twiyemeje gutanga ibikorwa bitazibagirana bigaragaza ubwiza bw'igihugu cyacu cyiza.

intro.title: Menya Umuco w'u Rwanda
intro.content1: Umuco w'u Rwanda ni mwiza kandi utandukanye nk'imisozi yarwo. Kuva ku mbyino n'umuziki by'umuco, kugeza ku bunagaciro, ibiryo, n'ibikorwa by'abaturage, hari uburyo bwinshi bwo kwiga umuco w'u Rwanda.
intro.content2: Ibikorwa byacu by'umuco byateguwe kugira ngo bitange ibikorwa by'ukuri hamwe n'abaturage bo mu gace, gushyigikira imigenzo ya kera no guha abashyitsi amahirwe yo kumva ubuzima n'imigenzo y'abanyarwanda.

bestTime.question: Ni ryari igihe cyiza cyo gusura u Rwanda?
bestTime.answer: U Rwanda rushobora gusurwa mu mwaka wose. Ibihe by'izuba (Kamena kugeza Nzeri na Ukuboza kugeza Gashyantare) ni byiza cyane mu gusura ingagi no kureba inyamaswa. Ibihe by'imvura bitanga imisozi itatse ubwiza kandi nta bantu benshi baba bahari.

visa.question: Nkeneye viza yo gusura u Rwanda?
visa.answer: Abashyitsi benshi bashobora kubona viza iyo bageze mu gihugu cyangwa bakayisaba kuri interineti binyuze ku rubuga rw'Abinjira n'Abasohoka mu Rwanda. Abaturage bamwe ntibakeneye viza. Turagusaba kureba amakuru ya viza aheruka mbere y'urugendo rwawe.

gorillaTrekking.question: Gusura ingagi bisaba amafaranga angana iki?
gorillaTrekking.answer: Uruhushya rwo gusura ingagi rusaba $1,500 ku muntu ku banyamahanga bataba abaturage. Ibi birimo amafaranga yo kwinjira muri pariki n'urugendo ruyobowe. Twebwe dukora ibijyanye n'impushya zose ku bakiriya bacu.

safety.question: U Rwanda rutekanye ku basura?
safety.answer: U Rwanda rufatwa nk'imwe mu bihugu bitekanye cyane muri Afurika. Rufite igipimo cyo hasi cy'ubugizi bwa nabi, ubuyobozi buhamye, n'ibikorwa remezo byiza. Nk'uko bimeze ahantu hose, ingamba zisanzwe z'urugendo zigomba kubahirizwa.

languages.question: Ni izihe ndimi zivugwa mu Rwanda?
languages.answer: Indimi zemewe ni Ikinyarwanda, Icyongereza, Igifaransa, n'Igiswahili. Icyongereza kivugwa cyane mu duce tw'ubukerarugendo, kandi abayobozi bacu bavuga neza Icyongereza.
